description: A React component named UserAdmin that provides an admin interface for listing users with pagination, fetching user data from an external API.

methods.name: UserAdmin()
methods.description: React functional component that displays a paginated list of users with loading and error handling.

methods.name: fetchUsers
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch user data for a specified page, updates component state accordingly.

methods.name: onPrev
methods.description: Handler to fetch previous page of users.

methods.name: onNext
methods.description: Handler to fetch next page of users.
